TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewButtonColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn

span.span: Hosts a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是特殊的類型的類別用來以邏輯方式裝載儲存格會以簡單的使用者輸入的回應。The class is a specialized type of the class used to logically host cells that respond to simple user input. A都有相關聯中每個，與它有交集。A has an associated in every that intersects it. 每個資料格會提供類似於使用者介面 (UI)控制項。Each cell supplies a user interface (UI) that is similar to a control. 若要顯示每個資料格的相同按鈕文字，請設定屬性，以`true`並設定所需的按鈕文字的屬性。To display the same button text for every cell, set the property to `true` and set the property to the desired button text. 此資料行類型的預設排序模式是。The default sort mode for this column type is . 若要回應使用者按下按鈕後，處理或事件。To respond to user button clicks, handle the or event. 在事件處理常式中，您可以使用來判斷是否按一下按鈕資料行的屬性。In the event handler, you can use the property to determine whether the click occurred in the button column. 您可以使用屬性來判斷是否要在按鈕儲存格，並不是在資料行標頭上發生按一下。You can use the property to determine whether the click occurred in a button cell and not on the column header. > [!NOTE] > 當啟用視覺化樣式時，按鈕資料行中的按鈕來塗繪，使用，和儲存格樣式，例如透過屬性指定會有任何作用。When visual styles are enabled, the buttons in a button column are painted using a , and cell styles specified through properties such as have no effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用在特定的資料列上執行動作。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to perform actions on particular rows. 在此範例中，事件處理常式會先判斷是否按一下按鈕儲存格上，然後擷取商務物件相關聯的資料列。In this example, a event handler first determines whether a click is on a button cell, then retrieves a business object associated with the row. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 存取 Windows Form DataGridViewComboBoxCell 下拉式清單中的物件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Access Objects in a Windows Forms DataGridViewComboBoxCell Drop-Down List](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding/CS/form1.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding/vb/form1.vb#100)]

span.para: 當您衍生自並將新屬性加入至衍生的類別，請務必覆寫方法，以便於複製作業期間複製新屬性。您也應該呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的內容複製到新的儲存格。

When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations. You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

summary.span: 取得或設定用來建立新儲存格的樣板。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式類別初始化這個屬性，以新建。The constructor for the class initializes this property to a newly created . > [!CAUTION] > 變更儲存格範本的內容不會立即影響資料行的現有儲存格的使用者的介面 (UI)。Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells. 這些變更才很明顯之後會重新產生資料行, (例如，藉由排序資料行，或透過呼叫方法)。These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the method). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用檢視使得員工的銷售額。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to view the sales an employee has made. 儲存格範本用來將相同的色彩套用至所有的按鈕。A cell template is used to apply the same color to all buttons. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#10)]

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別中呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的屬性複製到新的儲存格，並請務必也將複製的任何已新增至衍生類別的屬性值。

When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

summary.span: 取得或設定資料行的預設儲存格樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
The to be applied as the default style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值傳回此屬性具有初始屬性值為。The default returned by this property has an initial property value of . 這個值會覆寫中指定的值屬性控制項，但可能會覆寫其他的儲存格樣式屬性。This value overrides the value specified in the property of the control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 當啟用視覺化樣式時，按鈕資料行中的按鈕來塗繪，使用和儲存格樣式，例如透過屬性指定會有任何作用。When visual styles are enabled, the buttons in a button column are painted using a and cell styles specified through properties such as have no effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment/CS/changecolumnalignment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment/VB/changecolumnalignment.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定資料行中的按鈕儲存格的平面樣式外觀。

span.span: Gets or sets the flat-style appearance of the button cells in the column.

value.span: 值，表示資料行中的按鈕外觀。

span.span: A value indicating the appearance of the buttons in the column.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定資料行中的儲存格的外觀。The property specifies the appearance of the cells in the column. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 列舉。For more information, see the enumeration. 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 設定資料行值之後，若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定儲存格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用檢視使得員工的銷售額。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to view the sales an employee has made. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#10)]

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示於按鈕儲存格上的預設文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the default text displayed on the button cell.
A that contains the text.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個作為資料行中包含屬性值`true`顯示儲存格的按鈕上的屬性值。Each contained in the column that has as a property value of `true` displays the property value on the cell's button. 如果沒有相關聯控制項，變更此屬性會重新整理的資料行顯示。If there is an associated control, changing this property refreshes the column display. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用檢視使得員工的銷售額。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to view the sales an employee has made. 屬性用來設定資料行標頭。The property is used to set the column header. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 屬性值是否要顯示為此資料行中的儲存格之按鈕文字。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the property value is displayed as the button text for cells in this column.

value.span: 如果 屬性值顯示在此資料行中的按鈕上，則為 ；如果每一個儲存格的 屬性值顯示在其按鈕上，則為 。

span.span: if the property value is displayed on buttons in the column; if the property value of each cell is displayed on its button.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，按鈕的資料格會顯示為按鈕的文字。By default, the of a button cell is displayed as the text on the button. 屬性可讓您設定每個資料格，則按鈕文字，或使用按鈕儲存格的所有屬性值。The property allows you to either set the button text for each cell, or to use the property value for all of the button cells. 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 設定資料行值之後，若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定儲存格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#010](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#010)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#010](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#010)]
